t: Amazon China - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Amazon China (Chinese: 亚马逊中国), formerly known as Joyo.com (Chinese: 卓越网), is an online shopping website. Joyo.com was founded in early 2000 by the Chinese entrepreneur Lei Jun in Beijing, China. The company primarily sold books and other media goods, shipping to customers nationwide.

t: Amazon
s: The truth is that China has cloned Ford and Apple items. If those guys can't stop them how can we? I've been battling with someone else putting their brand name on my home made item for years now and Amazon could care less that someone hacked their system and put their brand on my item.

t: Why Chinese Sellers Are Dominating Amazon And How To Beat Them
s: If you’ve shopped on Amazon lately, you’ve probably noticed that the platform has become a cesspool of non-name brand goods. And most of these products are sold by private label sellers, retail/online arbitragers and companies in China selling direct on Amazon.
